message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.DS 

The paper discusses the development of a formal objective criterion for automating the reduction process of general agents to the MDP framework, which is a common topic in the fields of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), robotics (cs.RO), and control systems (cs.SY). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of dynamic Bayesian networks (cs.DS) and partially observable Markov decision processes (POMDPs), which further support the likelihood of these sub-categories.
